prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Structural typical details sheet with 12 numbered details covering partition wall anchorage, slab-on-grade construction, stepping continuous footing, reinforcement/tie/stirrup details, footing at pipe/conduit penetrations, footing intersections, and plate splice fix detail. Includes APPROVED stamp by Anthony Montes - Building Plan Check.
key_content: Detail 3: Partition top connection — Simpson TC @ 48" O.C., 2x4 blocking @ 48" O.C.
Detail 3: Shift pins — P.T.D.F. sill plate with power driven pins @ 32" O.C.
Detail 3: Partition wall framing anchor bolt at curb — 2-#3 @ 48" O.C.
Detail 1: Slab on grade — weakened plane joint, vapor barrier, sand per plan, clean gravel per plan
Detail 7: Stepping continuous footing — reinf. same size & spacing as footing reinf., top bars where occurs
Detail 5: Reinforcement — beam stirrups dia. 1-#3, seismic hooks (ductile), typical column tie
Detail 9: Ties & stirrups — hooks at 135 degrees, first at ties 1x min
Detail 12: Footing at pipe/conduit — sleeve 4" min larger than O.D. of pipe, recompact to 95%
Detail 11: Footing intersections — all corners & intersections shall have 2 #5 vertical U.C.N., provide outside corner lap bars, std 90° hook at inside bars
Detail 10: Plate splice fix detail — required when offset >6", counterbore over bolt head 1/8" min, stud @ 16" O.C., install 2x filler pieces to bridge bolt head
APPROVED stamp: Anthony Montes - Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: holdown schedule with uplift values
NOT SHOWN: roof-to-wall connection details (hurricane ties / DTC clips)
NOT SHOWN: anchor bolt embedment depth specification

drawing_zones.content: Partition top connection & partition wall anchorage — parallel/perpendicular to joists, shift pins, anchor bolt at curb
Slab on grade — cross-section at interior, step in slab, at garage/exterior
Stepping continuous footing — step up and step down transitions
Reinforcement — alternate positions, ductile seismic hooks, typical column tie, beam stirrups
Ties & stirrups — hook configurations at 135 degrees
Footing at pipe/conduit — sleeve requirements, recompaction notes
Footing intersections — corner, intersection, end, and splice sub-details with #5 vertical U.C.N.
Plate splice fix detail — counterbore over bolt head, filler pieces
APPROVED stamp — Anthony Montes, Building Plan Check
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, project info, sheet S3.0
